Comments_List: Exposure to research outside of Yale
Knowledge about current research topics in Environmental Economics
It was very fascinating to listen to prominent academic scholars and their research.
Yes, it was a low commitment yet rich learning experience.
Nice variety of research topics; generally good discussion

Good course - they brought in some very interesting lecturers!

Sometimes the discussion gets tied up in argumentation and interruption over very small points - and some times the interruptions are very rude. I understand this is the style of the course, but often it seems unnecessary and gratuitous. It also leads to rushing through the second half of the presentations, which often contain some of the most interesting material.
Good choice of lecturers. No improvements necessary.
Take if interested in being exposed to academic research in environmental economics
Take it if you are interested in learning about the latest research in Environmental Economics.
Any student interested in environmental economics should attend this seminar. The organizers bring some of the best active researchers in environmental economics each semester.
Take full advantage of the speakers when they come visit Yale for this seminar.
